Pre Open market data

Source: R/nse-preopen.R
preopen_nifty.Rd

Fetch data of pre open session of Nifty & Nifty Bank.

nse_preopen_nifty()

nse_preopen_nifty_bank()

Value

A tibble with the following columns:

symbol

NSE ticker.

series

Equity (EQ)

corp_action_date

Corporate action date.

corp_action

Corporate Action

price

Price

change

Change in price

percent_change

Percentage change in price.

prev_close

Previous close.

quantity

Quantity

value

Value (in lakhs),

mkt_cap

Free float market capitalization (in crores).

year_high

Normal market 52 week high.

year_low

Normal market 52 week low.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_preopen_nifty()
#> # A tibble: 50 x 13
#>    symbol series corp_action_date corp_action  price change percent_change
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>        <dbl>  <dbl>          <dbl>
#>  1 YESBA~ EQ     NA               NA            60.1  -2             -3.22
#>  2 BHART~ EQ     NA               NA           452.    4.55           1.02
#>  3 ZEEL   EQ     NA               NA           298    -2.05          -0.68
#>  4 TECHM  EQ     NA               NA           763.   -1.7           -0.22
#>  5 BPCL   EQ     NA               NA           491    -0.85          -0.17
#>  6 HDFC   EQ     NA               NA          2326.   -1.05          -0.05
#>  7 IOC    EQ     NA               NA           126.   -0.05          -0.04
#>  8 SUNPH~ EQ     NA               NA           440.    3.6            0.82
#>  9 GRASIM EQ     NA               NA           775     5.7            0.74
#> 10 INFRA~ EQ     NA               NA           248.    1.55           0.63
#> # ... with 40 more rows, and 6 more variables: prev_close <dbl>,
#> #   quantity <dbl>, value <dbl>, mkt_cap <dbl>, year_high <dbl>, year_low <dbl>
nse_preopen_nifty_bank()
#> # A tibble: 12 x 13
#>    symbol series corp_action_date corp_action  price change percent_change

#>  3 RBLBA~ EQ     NA               NA           368.    2             0.55 
#>  4 AXISB~ EQ     NA               NA           733.    3.55          0.49 
#>  5 INDUS~ EQ     NA               NA          1517     7.25          0.48 
#>  6 IDFCF~ EQ     NA               NA            44.8   0.2           0.45 
#>  7 PNB    EQ     NA               NA            62.6   0.25          0.4  
#>  8 ICICI~ EQ     NA               NA           530.    1.95          0.37
